# relations.not_equals_relation { #fave_recode.relations.not_equals_relation }

`relations.not_equals_relation(lhs, rhs)`

is lhs *not* `==` rhs

## Parameters

| Name   | Type                | Description     | Default    |
|--------|---------------------|-----------------|------------|
| `lhs`  | [Any](`typing.Any`) | left hand side  | _required_ |
| `rhs`  | [any](`any`)        | right hand side | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type           | Description   |
|----------------|---------------|
| [bool](`bool`) | True or False |
